title: Who are the descendants of the tribe of Ischar? - Quora

response.answer_text: The descendants of the 12 Tribes of Israel are the modern Jews and Samaritans. DNA has been taken from various peoples claiming to be the descendants of the supposedly lost Tribes of Israel. The majority are not related to the Jews, therefore cannot be a lost Tribe of Israelites. The only people to be related genetically to Ashkenazi, Sephardi, Mizrahi Jews are the Cochin Jews of India who are said to have originated from Israelite traders.
